name: cootravir-portal
description: Portal de aplicaciones COOTRAVIR con Single SPA

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:home" "npm run dev:it" "npm run dev:gestion-humana" "npm run dev:root"
scripts.build: npm run build:home && npm run build:it && npm run build:gestion-humana && npm run build:root
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd ../home && npm install && cd ../IT && npm install && cd ../gestion-humana && npm install
